entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is the one who has an office and is triumphant in her statement.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is hiding from Umbridge's office and is now visible again.

entities.name: trelawney
entities.description: Trelawney is a person who was sacked on a previous night.

entities.name: inquisitorial squad
entities.description: The Inquisitorial Squad are members of the school who look pleased with themselves.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a ghost who is bobbing overhead and gazing down at Fred and George.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the twins who are standing in the middle of the floor with an unmistakable look on their faces.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is the other twin who is standing in the middle of the floor with his brother Fred.

relationships.description: Umbridge's office is where Harry was hiding, and now he has become visible again.
The Inquisitorial Squad are standing near Peeves who is bobbing overhead.
Fred and George are standing together in the middle of the floor.
Umbridge is associated with the Inquisitorial Squad who look pleased with themselves.
